The intervention involve 1-2 psychosocial health education training workshops establishment manager worker , focus HIV/AIDS risk reduction information condom use condom negotiation skill-building . Participants also invite dream-building activity explore personal goal goal organization peer .
DOC.brief_title: Effects HIV Intervention Among Sex Workers Philippines
DOC.detailed_description: This study implement socio-behavioral intervention Quezon City , Philippines , use community-based participatory approach . The intervention involve 1-2 psychosocial health education training workshops establishment manager worker , focus HIV/AIDS risk reduction information , condom use , condom negotiation skill-building . Participants also invite dream-building activity explore personal goal goal organization peer . The intervention involve target tailored bio-psycho-educational intervention direct organizational behavior change social influence model train peer manager . The intervention site receive peer manager training consist specific information STIs along standard care , hold day convenient participant establishment neutral location . In addition quick pre-post test immediately intervention , participant interview 6-12 month intervention evaluate effect intervention STI/HIV knowledge , attitude , belief , safer sex practice , social support .
DOC.criteria: selfidentification conduct sex work work venue sex work occurs . actively engage sex work activity work venue area sex work occur .
